lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling) Before we get into our game tonight, we do have a few announcements to get through, beginning with our fantastic friend and sponsor to the show for all of campaign two--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scandalous accusations about me accepting illegal campaign donations from a foreign agent, Mark Hulmes, from the evil, British D&D show, High Rollers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not so fast, Riegel! I haven't responded to your little inquiry yet, and I think I know why you don't want me to, because this week I uncovered new facts that will completely exonerate me and my adorable running mate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it? Is it? I brought that video to my lab.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I loaded it, yes, into a level nine, microflux video meter and scrubbed the footage using a military-grade, series seven vector graphic discombobulator.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll the actual footage of that meeting.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Well, after you win the D&D Beyond election, you remember your mission?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But won't that be confusing? I mean, nobody knows what a stone is, or how much it weighs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If that footage was so easily altered, Dr. Willingham, what's to say that you didn't alter it, huh? How can you prove that you didn't alter the footage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While Travis did his analysis, I hacked into your laptop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My password is impossible to crack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah? Uncrackable? You mean the password "$am is awe$ome," with dollar signs for all the S's? I figured it out in two minutes! (laughs)

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Uh, uh, uh. I think you mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't be here right now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes it makes me wonder why I even bring the thunder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why he even brings the thunder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, thank you, everyone, and our friends at D&D Beyond.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, wait. When is Sam going to come back?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's off the show now because he didn't win to be president?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, when you're in a jam, just call DW.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So our other announcements for the night. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So sad! He left his phone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, I should've worn my shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the entire month of June, 100% of the profits will be going to OutRight International, which is a fantastic organization, and you guys should look it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I should let you know, it's all pre-order, so both shirts are going to ship within the next few weeks, just so you guys know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or is Nott still being held by you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Nott and the other humanoids had jumped and we were Feather Falling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so you're still a flying, giant eagle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we left off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up and see the shadow of the bird (whooshing) emerge from above.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we try and catch them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to make myself look as much like a leaf as I can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I know it can only be a person that you disguise yourself as, so I'm like, I'm a big leaf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a person wearing a leaf costume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester goes into leaf mode. What are the rest of you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you said we're still 250 feet up, so it's going to be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 150 feet up, so you got about three rounds before you land.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My hat is a little stem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use Mask of Many Faces to make myself look like carved up already, and decaying, like decaying zombie Fjord, like rotting meat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look like Taliesin as strawberry in your kids cartoon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's where I was going with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, you should have made yourself look like a leaf!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I swim back towards the tree?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Swim? (laughs) Do we know how physics work yet on this campaign?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you attempt to flail midair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have a deep relationship with free falling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feather Fall, it's not a concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for a minute, I believe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it. It just says until they land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, duration one minute. It's a minute or they land.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Invisibility on myself as I fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I should have done that. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was an option for you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You decided to be an even more bright, shiny target, something that birds like to eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing bad ever happens to somebody who's a leaf on the wind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a Macy's Day balloon puller falling from the sky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please be going after the Wooly Mammoth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled pretty well on perception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When it gets within 60 feet of me, I want to cast Command.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's right now about 200 feet away, but it's moving at 120 feet a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you casting Command for towards it? What are you getting it to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the DC on that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else gets something to do on this round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What height are we? How many feet off the ground-ish?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. (laughs) I had to use all my fucking spells.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will hold my bonus action, Misty Step, from the falchion until the roc comes within grasping distance of me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How close am I away from Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all jumped together, so you're about five feet from him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach out and grab Fjord, and be like: Please don't fucking leave me here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I only got room for one on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Nott, you guys are remaining invisible and just holding on for dear life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone's fucking bailing on me, and I ain't got shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb, hearing these two bicker with eagle ears, is going to fly within their reach and just try to stay close to them as they fall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I make myself tiny to hopefully be as small of a speck as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just for the hell of it, I want all of you to roll a stealth check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage for you, disadvantage for Beau, and disadvantage for Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disadvantage? Damn it. That would have been better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just making loud noises and swooping by.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know what I am doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is coming straight towards Jester and Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its beak snatches out towards you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I do the Misty Step?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 20 that you managed to dodge out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans) But what if he was aiming towards me and right at the last minute, I (whooshing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screeches) It's going to go ahead and go towards attempting to grab somebody the next round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If she gets pushed toward me, and if I'm by the tree, can I try and reach out and grab her and throw her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach out and Jester goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you hold Jester's hand. That's your action?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still trying to be stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, anything? You're at the bottom now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's going to touch down after this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you're still Feather Falling, so no damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't count as landing if we hit the tree, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purposes of this spell, it's landing onto a solid surface where there's no more fall momentum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it doesn't see me, so I'm okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I'm 30 feet away, can I use my Hexblade's Curse to just mark the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And when I say massive, I mean...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you just burp? Was that you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we anywhere near that little alcove cave, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not that far from it, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so we can move towards that while this is happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My god, there better be some fucking gopher holes in the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will it fit all of us, that alcove?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've never fought a roc before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a big, squawking predator of (screeches), whatever it needs to hear to maybe throw it off for a second, get some movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll allow a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a worth a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, anything you're doing or just?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're close to the ground, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, after this round, everybody's hit the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have time to race toward the ground and drop the spell, or are we past that point?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm just going to just, now that I see we're close, I'm going to nosedive and then hit the ground and then roll as Caleb in a big pile.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guiding everyone to the hidey hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, we're going to hit the ground anyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just waiting to hit the ground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I was going to Dimension Door us, but if we're going to hit the ground anyway then it's pointless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to the alcove! You can go to the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Dimension Door as we're falling, the door like right behind us, and as we go through the door, I bamf us into the little alcove at the bottom of the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its going to beak attack you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 20 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thunder Step would be super cool if you were stuck in a talon, huh? Thanks for that spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take up and it's about now 50 feet away and up on the ground with Fjord in its talon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too late to do anything before it goes as an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it's turn. Now what do you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone can now take their action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move my full 30 feet toward Fjord and the roc, and if it's in range I will pull out my caterpillar and cast Polymorph on the roc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the DC on this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was such a good idea!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you attempt to transmute its form into that of a much smaller bird, it seems to shrug off the magical effect as a brief flicker of its outline before the spell just dissipates. (hisses faintly)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do beak and talons count as weapon attacks or no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since he's close enough at the moment, I'm going to try and cast Ray of Enfeeblement on the roc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the save on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, this roc is pretty powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to try and wait for him to get somewhere above the alcove so I can ditch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll just ride the fucking roc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you disappear, you grab the feathers and it's immediately your lips like (flapping) in the wind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away are we from it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you're about 70 feet from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm not going to try to Polymorph it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 70 feet straight up, or 70 feet angular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 70 feet outward, and about 30 feet up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait Fjord, he's now on the bird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm over here, I'm over here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless you try to Polymorph it into something equally as rideable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, a little late now, but also gets another attack if he does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already spent my move this turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All my movement if for some reason it starts to go over the alcove area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I won't lose invisibility if I use an item, right? It's not an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a potion that I made, a smoke bomb potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you won't lose invisibility. No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to smash that around us, and so we have 20-foot radius of smoke around us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just a plume of fog smoke that appears in a big cloud at the base of the tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now we just can't see what's happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't see us, or she.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The nearest tree bough was 300 feet, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it trying to clear under the bough, or is it trying to go up and away from it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It coasted down to attack and grab Caleb off the ground, and now it's picking up and gaining gradual height as it's about 30 to 40 feet off the ground and about 70 feet out from the base.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb runs right towards Jester and yells get on my back! (whooshing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm waiting for everyone else to finish what they're doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try running back up to the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could try to cast Polymorph.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But if he gets away from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try and cast Polymorph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to try and cast Polymorph?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to turn him into a bat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshing) Fjord gets jettisoned at 120 feet per round outward in an arc, like out of a cannon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck you guys! This won't help me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, if he's coasting, then I'm trying to gauge where he is, and holding a feather and trying to catch him as he gets within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Feather Fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is so far out of your range of Feather Fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was 70 feet away from you, and then now got shot even further, another 120 feet out that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then if I can do something, I'm turning into an eagle and flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many more casts of Polymorph do you have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have one more 4th-level spell slot left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're turning into an eagle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The speed of the giant eagle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't get to him, but you're heading that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not trained necessarily how to best break your fall when jettisoned via a roc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a moment, it's beautiful, this view and the wind in your hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get all of his rolling in his hands?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just two. That's two dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then white hot pain, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, soreness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far away are we on the eagle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're okay? Didn't you take 25 before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's got more than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're lying on your back, just torn up, rocks and dust and scrapes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I jump out of the alcove. Fjord!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, we're just going to give you a little bit of a pick-me-up, and I'm just going to do Cure Wounds, just to get you back up and running.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm casting that at 4th-level, so that's a 4d8 plus five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just 20 points of healing, just to get you a little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you hop on, and we've got a second where there's not going to be, how long is it just going to be a bat, out of curiosity?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Polymorph, it's an hour long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that mean that the eagle can comprehend everything I'm saying, since I can talk to animals?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he can comprehend what anyone's saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to take a second to drop Fjord off and maybe take a quick look in that nest and see what's up there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the drop me off part.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm running towards them as much as I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're safe in this cloud of smoke!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we both fit on you or no?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can two people ride on a giant eagle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One person can ride on a giant eagle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I'll go back with him, and I think you know the plan now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a cloud of smoke and I'm going to look for Beauregard on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and make your way over to the cloud of smoke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm following behind Jester a little bit, like 20 feet or so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd be able to see both Jester and Beauregard emerge from the smoke cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, Fjord, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look and there's this little bat (flapping).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Catch it in a butterfly net.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thwacking) (laughter) Just (squeaks) little squeaks, and it's trying to bite through, and it's just pissed off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take my little cape off and I try to catch him in my hood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wrap it in there, and you now have this little satchel with a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord's out there pissing himself, derry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we just put him in the bag of holding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't want to cross spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This could be a mama bird and her babies are up there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it very much is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She had a nest, after all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're going up and check it out before we go in this cave to hide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up! (laughter) Fucking, my ear. God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want me to go back up there into that nest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, on top of this guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You might want to take the bag too, might be a clever--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, just leave him up there and then we can fly down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can take the bag and grab anything interesting up there, put it in the bag, and then come on down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye out for any more rocs, make sure this isn't mama roc, and there's not a daddy roc somewhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and calm the roc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're keeping an eye out as you're flying up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if I did though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear it squeaking as it's constantly fighting against it, but it doesn't have a lot of strength to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't seen an angry roc bat since an Ozzy Osbourne concert.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and both make a perception check for me if you don't mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 20 on that first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you were looking for possible other rocs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say yeah. Then I'll allow it to stick. What'd you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's a wagon wheel and there's all sorts of shit that's just been mashed into this nest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaping from branch to branch, eventually--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see also within there, the feathers freshly starting to come in, a baby roc.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bigger or smaller than Caleb is right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I'd say a little bit smaller than Caleb, but only barely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The rest of the episode is just this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there shiny shit in the nest? Has it been hoarding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There might be, but you'd have to go through, because it's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we in the nest now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's porous, all branches and whatever else can be found, there probably are shiny things in there probably, but you'd have to sift through it and search for a while to find anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is covered in bird shit and saliva--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to understand your point that you're making.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn and slide her down, that's it, slide her down along one wing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stop and you look up at this 12-foot baby bird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not what I meant, but it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that not what you meant?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I meant to set her down here and me go down in, but this is funny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take out my staff and I'm just like: Scritches? I give him scritches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dagon does not exist in this world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach, you take your staff and scratch the side of its face and it's like (squawking and chomping).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you feed it a ration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now expectant of more food to come now that you've begun the feeding cycle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do the dog fake out thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of what? Another ration? What else you got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I thought you were faking it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poor baby bird. Going to eat some ball bearings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- push through in here as well, or is too hard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just on a branch right above it, so you can just leap down onto it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a massive nest and it is lumpy and precarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That goes well with you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb moseys up next to Beauregard. (screeches)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see anything, just looking down as I'm running around?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll a 20, roll a 20, roll a 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing a big old thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm making a little bit of presentation to get attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature is now looking for wherever the ball bearings went, turns back to you and goes (squawks).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just going to have to do a general search over time, and it'll take a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally. It's just you guys. It's not us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meanwhile, the baby's coming up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we need a ten-minute lead time to go, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's opening its mouth now in the same expectant feed me kind of way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to take us more than ten minutes to get away from the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to start investigating, going through stacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flying to the top, the slow approach, up to here, I'd say roughly about five minutes to go all that, ten minutes for the first search.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to make friends and canoodle a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shout up when it's been 30 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a couple of sacks that contain what probably would have been some sort of a merchant caravan that was assaulted by this creature a while back, and what comes to about 210 gold pieces and 15 silver pieces, so you can write that down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should get the moorbounders ready to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys go and start gathering the moorbounders, getting them prepped and fed and ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should wait for night, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, remember? Everything's really powerful at night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should travel during the day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys woke up not that long ago when all this began.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can see your elbow, like your bone, the bone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start getting close to it to try and befriend it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class as a giant eagle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hop back a few steps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's expecting its next bit of its meal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pushing on the half an hour mark here now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, actually, it's not as bad as I thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll throw them around my belt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got the bag of holding!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right! I have the bag of holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heard Jester shout out from below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey y'all! It's been a while and this things going to turn back and we need to get away and stuff!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you counting with your keen bird brain? You're counting seconds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, and the bat's being held by...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The bat's being held by me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every round it's trying to break free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It manages to tear out. (fluttering) (laughter) So one concentration check as the first hit does get to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to react to it, if that's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he roll? What was it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I would have canceled that natural 20 immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it still hits you for a damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still hits, so I still got to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll higher than a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It can't do that much damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bat is now escaping and starting to try and bite at Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Bane on the bat, if that's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not going to roll well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you do anything? You're just going to let it keep attacking you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bat and it rolled a four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it gets a d4 against that as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It escapes, gets one bite, you're like, "No." It's back in the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've only looked through about maybe 1/5th of the nest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got to take ten more-- one more look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks interesting. Go over there! One more! Ten more fucking minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. How long does Bane last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bane, that's a good question, lasts--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so how many spell slots do you have? They just got another ten minutes now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anytime he gets out, I'm going to hit it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has to be within view, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It breaks free and immediately goes to attack you and gets stuck halfway in the cloak that it just escaped from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just put it back over him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold him and I try to pet him as he's in the cloak like: Calm down, bud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you have to beat an eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An eight with the negative four?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! I rolled a one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so he's going to attack you again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just keep trying to put him back in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Imagine that you're Rodan and this shit happened to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as an additional 40 gold pieces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it in the first minute? Was it further down or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you mark your spell slots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You going to try and capture it again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't even imagine what that sounded like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's back in the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's 11 points piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, with Beau on its back, it gets an attack of opportunity on you as you back out of its combat range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said I wasn't going to-- oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it attacking me? Can I do something to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's attacking him, which means you can if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you within melee of it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you right next to him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess I could do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, when it was trying to snap at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure that hits, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This dice has been rolling really well tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you guys have Feather Fall still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a horrible, sad noise when you crack it in the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You made me fucking hit a bird!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A 12-foot bird. Let's not forget about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get to the edge of the nest, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're, like, standing on Caleb's shoulders as he transforms back into himself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, we've got to get out of here! (screeches)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're coming, they're coming! Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a little over ten minutes left of the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little over ten minutes left? Holy shit! I thought we had 20 minutes left!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I thought we had 20 minutes left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To fly back down and get to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All we need is three minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've been very kind in some of the allowances I've done here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me double check this is not a...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it? What's your moorbounder's name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jannik, because Caleb can't command it, so I will take the helm of Jannik.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go flying 20 feet onto your back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take three points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll get off the one with Caleb and I'll try to get onto Jannik.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you attempt to walk towards it, (barks) instinctually goes and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not going to work for me either!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to step and catch its snout.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It actually gains a little respect for you after you catch its snout.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Phantasmal Force on the moorbounder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It has to beat a DC 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This whole time he's been attacking me in a leaf costume.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're still in the leaf costume. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no minuses or pluses for the moorbounder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm looking it up right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're still in the leaf costume?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've joined the rest of the group as this is all happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Command on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Command on the bat and tell it to go home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does Command last? For one round?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, are you not an eagle anymore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We get on the moorbounders and we start to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he can't fly fast enough to catch up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god no. The bat? By no means can it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but he's going to change back in a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to change back real soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're looking for anywhere for cover, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull everyone. Take cover, take cover!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all make your way into this little tunnel right as you hear (screeches).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, everyone make stealth checks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There might not be enough time, but he's doing it anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, well he doesn't know that, so he's doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you begin doing that. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, your butt is sticking out. Your butt!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to prep a spell for as soon as...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as he's within-- oh god, it's close-- 30 feet of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the pools of rainwater that are still visible across the muck on the outside, and you can see where there's barbs rising.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moorbounders are getting restless and (growling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How big is that portal again? You said it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god! (laughter and shushing) That was in-game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (wings flapping) Then it passes. No sound.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb just lays down on the ground in the mud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What'd you find up there, Beau? Something that was well worth it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start pulling out all the loot, including my giant roc feather.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to sit at the entryway and just keep an eye out on things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are just nice, noble clothing, silks and high tread count.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might be a little smelly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Careful, you might want to check it for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so make a lock picking check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take one of the silk robes off and put it on Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else in there, also make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a fireball trap in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know have any healing spells left?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's so many that he's rolling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take 12 points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will lessen that to zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now Marisha, you have Evasion, so even on a failure, I think you still take half damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now we can see what's in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After the ringing in your ears fades, the inside of the rock is slightly singed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, it's just 20 more seconds of time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was just a little box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just build that one little step in, just one more little step.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It got blown out a little bit from when the explosion happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have any runes or gems or anything? It's just a simple gold ring?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While Nott is distracted, and looking at that,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- and put it in the haversack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus, I have not prepared the ability to sense the arcane here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a short rest would be good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we take a short rest while--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can indeed take a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, and you get to recover from your arcane recovery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm going to spend ten minutes ritual casting Detect Magic on everything that was found to see if anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ring that was in that lockbox does give off a magic aura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I definitely want that shit now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and I will spend the next ten minutes casting Identify the same way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a Ring of Protection.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, of course it's not for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A new Caleb is here, everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Actually, I've been giving loot out for months.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the shoulder he had surgery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they literally charge electricity and shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both Yasha and Caleb could use that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you already get a ring? Where did we get that other ring? Didn't we have one already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so you already have one on, right? You can't have more than one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about how many things you can have attuned to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does it do? Is it plus to AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus one to your AC and I believe saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You already have one though, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It makes more sense for Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I would love to wear it, but I can only concentrate on so many items at once.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe once I get my bracers and everything, would you want to take it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you lose something, you can give it to somebody else and they can use the thing that you don't need anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what other things do you want to get rid of? I think she's saying if you something you want to get rid of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau just give you a ring.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does that mean what I think it means?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What finger are you going to put it on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to put it on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just go to equipment and add Ring of Protection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enough time has passed where you don't necessarily feel like you're immediately being beared down on by an angry roc.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Caleb, can you sent Frumpkin out and see if the bird is looking at us still?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. I'm just going to make a straight roll, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is way off and has no scope of what distance, but it is quite a ways away, anywhere between 50, 60 miles away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's definitely still present and hasn't given up, it's just in a different direction for now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't tell quite how much, but we need to go carefully if we are going to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or perhaps we wait till the nighttime.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Looking at this ring. Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out where we are, is there any of that grass on the ground that was appearing near the tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you are now? Absolutely not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty much a hundred feet out from the tree is the extent of where any of that seems to grow, and that's only when night falls, it seems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you first arrived at the tree and when you left the tree--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems like about ten, 15 feet from its base is always verdant, and then further out it seems to extend in the night and then retract in the day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cruising on, are you going fast pace?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think slow to start, and then 15 minutes after we'll speed up a little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to keep an eye out of other monsters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eye on the sky. There's lots--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check from you are you're taking point from this again, Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys want to crest on the upper edge or go through or on the other side? What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm no tactician, but it feels like not down in the middle, right? Because that's ambush point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord's been rubbing off on me a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have little glimpses of blue sky and the day is getting hotter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too! I was going to say left, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you cruise to the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately you hear (horn blaring), and a cluster of orc marauders start rushing in your direction and getting arrows ready. (clicking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are cruising by, they're now starting to pass you on the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they are. That's a critical hit on Jester's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two hits on yours because you were the one up front and then one on each of your moorbounders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I deflect the one that's hitting Jannik?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be difficult to do this, so you have to roll real high to try this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try and reach and you start cruising off to the side and your hand goes for it, but it's just a little bit out of your reach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away are they from us at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 13 points of piercing damage to your moorbounder, which brings him to close to half health.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then that's going to be seven to yours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, when that happens, I clap some bat guano and sulfur together in my hands and throw a Fireball behind them by about 30 feet, 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other and realize they can't really keep up, but the one that's holding the horn gives another horn sound, (horn blaring) echoing down into the area, and you can see a little bit of dust gathering on the opposite side of the cavern, the other ridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be, from where you are right now, about 120 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would I have made a wisdom save for humanoid orcs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, yeah. You beat that, no problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to say: Hello, bees! And I'm going to cast Insect Plague on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as a thousand tiny little flashes of light (fire sparking), like a tiny sparkler goes off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the ones that are riding on wargs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're going to try and hold on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It obscured their vision, too, of the area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's still two more that are pushed out of the cloud and are trying to catch up to you, and as you guys move forward (footsteps thumping)--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a Mass Healing Word with a bonus action at level three for our mounts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For our mounts. Oh, okay. (laughs) I'm like wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of them gain nine hit points back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I absolutely have more fire to throw, too, if they're in range, then I would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're starting to try and cruise in towards you, the two that are still around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 50-foot range, so I will finish the job.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll your damage for your Fireball for the two that are over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look behind and there's no additional chase following you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we just defeat a whole village in like 30 seconds?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it took us days to leave a tree? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need to check the arrow wounds in case they were poison-tipped or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I healed it and it seemed to do the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were just on this ridge before you just rode up and blew the shit out them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gary, do you see those guys? (explosion)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shouldn't have blown the horn, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's an entire page of possible interactions there I can put aside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, they were shooting at us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could have been all sorts of interestingness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pressing forward, Caduceus, as you're on point, make another perception check for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want everyone to try and carefully maneuver into a stealthy position, probably slowing your speed a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace is gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just circles off and continues doing a loop just off to the west side, seemingly just barely missing the opportunity to make out your pack heading northward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it follows us forever? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We get out of the ship to Tal'Dorei and it's just (wings flapping).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, mama! I am very, oh, my god! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've taken a few breaks today and have slowed a bit of travel, so you could either break for the night somewhere or press on for an addition hour of travel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I vote if we fight something else, we are wiped the fuck out and we will die probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can find maybe a proper-- Bazzoxan's a real town, right? It's a town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know why I would know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, does it look like a town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's another hour of travel, full speed, to get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got something in my pocket just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay or go? What do you think? (sighing)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, of course I would be fine with pressing on, but I know for some of you, that might not be wise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've been riding a thin line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, no? No! We have a mission that we have to complete.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but if we all die before we even get to complete that mission...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anywhere around that looks like a good place to bed in for the night, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's open fields here until you get to the base of the Penumbra Range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go. Let's do it. Commit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we still in the badlands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the cusp of the Barbed Fields.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can also, instead of going full speed ahead, just try and go super stealthy and take extra time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take two hours and go stealthily if you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have that globe, can do the same thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a lot, but a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Full speed, take an hour? Slow speed, stealthily, take two hours?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Full speed or not at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Full speed or not at all

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody please make a constitution saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pushing on the extra hour of full movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a plus one on saves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Jester you're the one who takes a point of exhaustion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys slowly begin to make your way towards Bazzoxan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that point you begin to see a group of about seven of these armored figures notice your arrival and begin to walk in your direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where we'll take our break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll return here in just a moment with the arrival to Bazzoxan and see what that entails as you approach--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spires of jet, you said? So black?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it match the color of the stuff behind it, the ridge behind it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The stone is more of a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the same color as the spires, of the various barbs along the fields, where most of the ground is a deep, ruddy red, clay earth, the spires themselves are more of a deep gray.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, that's making my spider sense tingle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To enter, go ahead and, in our Twitch chat here, enter in the word delve, D-E-L-V-E.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you guys in a few minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (upbeat music) ♪ You got the perfect warlock ♪ ♪ Her weapons and supplies ♪ ♪ But you need a place to track your stuff ♪ ♪ 'Cause you're so disorganized ♪ ♪ You click open the web page ♪ ♪ You heard about on Critical Role ♪ ♪ And now you're ready to kick some butt ♪ ♪ In that mineshaft full of gnolls ♪ ♪ It's D&D, D&D ♪ ♪ Yeah, D&D Beyond ♪ ♪ Yeah D&D, D&D ♪ ♪ Yeah, D&D Beyond ♪ ♪ You got your stats ♪ ♪ You've got your swords ♪ ♪ You've got your invisible wand ♪ ♪ It's D&D, D&D ♪ ♪ D&D, D&D ♪ ♪ D&D Beyond ♪

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (dramatic music) Have you always wanted to be a voice actor? (gasps)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What is the holiest of flavors? Pepperoni?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can put it in pasta.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We don't like questions about what people intend to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think it was the Wildmother, definitely going to Caduceus about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean anybody that can interrupt that signal or the act of said arcane powers being taken away--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that was a big deal.

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: It was such a big deal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then do you just hang out near a giant tree in the middle of a wasteland?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Spoilers, this is from campaign one of Critical Role.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So good! Love that tattoo work.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How did Beau feel about sharing that piece of her story with Yasha? Did she do it because she wanted to comfort Yasha about her past, or did she think of it as an opportunity to share her pain with someone who understands?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau's not a comforter, literally and figuratively.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Was that a joke about her not being a blanket basically?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Boy, I've said some bad ones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was trying to just roll past it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just going to wait because--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughs) You don't want other people around you have to kick out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, that bubble, I bet it's echoey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By the time we were Vox Machina, we'd already been playing for two years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were like level seven, eight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we're over that now, so...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was bad stuff going on.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: And all you could do to repay her was a measly kiss on the cheek?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Don't look to Dani when I--

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: Why are you looking at me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes looking back I'm like, "Oh, "that was not a normal upbringing, but it was fun." My parents, we had a party house.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, everybody tells stories about you kids going to bed and going can you guys keep it down?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Your mom still stays up and watches--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not measured by "Oh, that's when I was working on this, "or that's when I was working on this." It's more about the life experiences that I had, and I think that's a positive thing.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Those are the milestones you remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do to prepare for their arrival?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am casting Dancing Light so the globules of light are rotating around Beauregard and Nott and me so that this badge can be seen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to be loud and proud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leaving it all up to Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 80 or so feet out, six of them all pull out variations of heavy crossbows, longbows, and just go ahead and get them ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one in the center, who you can see on the armor has a small, red sash that goes over one shoulder and then dangles across the front of the armor approaches and puts ahead forward to the rest of you, putting a hand up. "(speaks Undercommon)"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are friend of the Bright Queen, all of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I slide down off of Jannik and start to walk forward holding the medallion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you take a few steps forward, some of them get their weapons ready, takes a few steps and meets--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My hand up in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And how would a human with a "Zemnian accent come about the favor of the Bright Queen?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is not a story that is told quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your purpose for being here?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps you have heard of a man named Essek of Den Thelyss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am familiar with those of Thelyss."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He also can vouch for us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Passing through, "what is your business in the city, then? "What is this?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might not look it, but we are friends to the Dynasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Comes out swinging with a left and a right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are not a place for visitors often, "so it is your responsibility to take care "of you and your company, but welcome to Bazzoxan."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any advice for how to not step out of line or cause any waves? We want to abide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be quiet, do your work, and leave."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Especially you folks who have darkvision and can see from this distance with a decent enough wisdom, these are soldiers that have seen some shit. (laughs) The reason they're less interested if you is because you seem like less of a threat than maybe some of the things they've deal with in the past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find a place to turn in for the night, somewhere that the creatures will be safe, because we've got some very unruly friends that we're riding in on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The little pale globules are just sort of bubbling in the air around us in a circle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need a place to stay, but this is probably not where we're going to find Obann, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he might be in the mountains if what I saw was true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're certainly not going to go any further now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't find that entrance or whatever it was he was looking for in the dark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have been our best bet in trying to find this Obann, so perhaps we count our losses and blessings and bed down for the night and try again tomorrow, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty tired, so I could do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't get killed by a giant bird.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do like this leaf look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, this one? I cast Disguise Self again and put it on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) I didn't what you were! I was like, is she a lizard? Is she some sort of a cobra snake or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was falling, so it was hard to make out the details.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was trying to think about it all day, but I didn't want to insult you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look a little bit like a snap pea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! I give Caduceus a hug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see any stables or other areas where we might be able to board the...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see some soldiers do have their own moorbounders and are doing a perimeter on the far outskirts in the city, but it looks like it is directly under the Aurora Watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a primarily military presence in this city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So people are risking their asses to make money out here in hell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are probably a few bars.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should find out what the nightly threats are around here, what they're used to fighting off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and why they look so haggard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, let's see if we can find an empty stable for the kitties.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That, and then we'll get a nightcap and find out a little bit, and then go the hell to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't a very sharing society.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, should we find somewhere to stay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see anything that looks like it might have extra space, or voices coming from inside, some sort of shared hall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or is there anyone walking about right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see faint bits of green lantern light towards the base of it, similar to a lot of the light that gives the glow to the central portions of Rosohna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, maybe you ask around for a place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, can I find a small grouping of maybe these soldiers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looking for lodging, somewhere to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't have many visitors that come through."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why's it called The Ready Room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's where most of the supplies "for general populace is kept."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any other stores that you could make us aware of, or we might be able to restock or upgrade our situation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everything else is currently in the military set."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's on the watch list for tonight? Threats, terrors, things you see often?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, there is everything that lives south "of this place in the Barbed Fields, "and everything that attempts to escape from that," and points towards the northern mountain where the large temple-like structure that you noticed is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean escape from up there? What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a large set of gargantuan black doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We only managed to build part "of this city before it was assailed, "and now we sit for the better part "of a century at a stalemate."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You mean, things come out of there, you try and fight them off as best you can, and no ground has been won?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're doing the best we can with what we have."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I peek over my shoulder at the group and see Jester doing the fucking Cabbage Patch, and I'm like: They might not look like much, but we're here to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we'll take everything we can get."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you need anything, just holler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would they build a city here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have any of y'all heard of something called the Umbra Gates?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have we ever heard of something called The Umbra Gates?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a history check, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This in particular was a deep-set multi, multi, multi-leveled temple that was the center of the Prime Material Plane's seat to the Princes of the Abyss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was where the Seat of the Abyss sat in Xhorhas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anti-Rock of Eternity, for all the Shazam nerds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this the location on ever Final Fantasy game where you got to max out all your stats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Could be, depending on how long you want to hang.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Na, na, na, na, na, na, na.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've had no experience of the Xhorhas or the culture of the Dynasty before all this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Abyss is demons, Hell is devils.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, this Ready Room, does that sound like a hotel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had a children's book of all the levels of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It sounds like a co-op really more than anything, but yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you know, drop a little, pick up a little, stay if you need to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that our best bet, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless you just want to rough it in the barracks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should stay apart from the soldiers here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll head over to the Ready Room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is one of the central barter, trade places of Bazzoxan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you can see there's a ladder that leads up into an upper top deck area, and there is a sign that says "Lodging." It looks pretty rough and tumble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nowhere that looks like it would have some spell components or anything like that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're looking for shelter for the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, plus for our livestock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we let someone else take care of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For all of you for the night, "that would be one gold, two silver."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anybody outside of the building that is watching the outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are people outside the building currently, yeah, that are in the process of offloading equipment or picking up equipment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not focused on you, but you can hear them shifting things, the impact of heavy sacks and building materials (crashing) scraping on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand next to the sign to the Ready Room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said to inquire about the sort of encounters you have around here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Soldiers tend to them as best they can."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From what you've heard, how long does it take to get from here to those towers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure you've heard them talking about it, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to bother myself with this sort of--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a stale look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just here to do a thorough job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Bless on me and Fjord and...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that do anything for this roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he goes, "(sighs) There are multiple barricades "set up throughout the exterior "and interior of the various tunnels of Bazzoxan, "but things still manage to creep past "and the soldiers kill them and try to fill the gaps."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there access to these tunnels?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any food? Do we need any food?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would certainly help for tomorrow if we had access to some food.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do have some moorbounders outside, and we need some rough rations for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, brother?" "We have some more guests for the night, "if you could prepare us some food for them, "and how many moorbounders you said?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll make food for them, "you get the food for the moorbounders." "All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know it may not go too far out here, but here's another two gold for each of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An additional gold for the remainder "of the moorbounder meals, please."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know this might be a bit of a long shot for your establishment, but have you any incense here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got some stuff I got to do, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much do you need? "Like a pinch?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take it off your hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need 250 gold worth of incense and 200 gold worth of ivory.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, 10% more than you are accustomed to charging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need to go call in some favors."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can give you that hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a barrel of peanut butter and 400 meters of wire, and a pound of dove feathers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want any of those things, Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me go check." She comes from around the counter and passes all of you and exits the complex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While they were all inside talking, I was trying to paint the sign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you still in your leaf costume? (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that would have been gone by now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do this. You're blessed, right? Did you use Bless on the last roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you manage to pull it off, and most everyone seems to be leaving with their materials and you finish up real fast, and that is such, the Ruddy Poon is now a center of goods and commerce here on this side of Bazzoxan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast Silent Image to make an image of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans forward and inspects closely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he comes in in the night tell him we're waiting for him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're talking about two different things, but I think yours takes precedence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need 250 gold worth of incense, and 200 gold worth of ivory strips.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can deal with this as well, I believe."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the rate for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, this will run you about a thousand gold pieces, "but I can provide an amount of which "seems to fulfill your requests."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My personal need is about 250 gold worth, plus the 200 gold worth--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only request is if anybody asks you, "do not say where or how you received this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I probably won't even remember, honestly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would take what you would rate at about 50 gold, and we will add 30 to the price of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will add 50 to the price, "and it will be, say, 350 total?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we gathered or collected anything, sundries or staples along our journey that we could maybe use in trade for some of this stuff? Have we picked up any weird, 20 pounds of, I don't know, something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you in need of anything right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any other little thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gator skins? Need any gator skins?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can afford your price, but we have a lot of odds and ends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Show me this gator skin you have."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in the bag of holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can feed it to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't want it now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't we get some jewelry in the nest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I was going to say I have those two gold rings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, keep those! They're so pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "350 gold, and for the ivory, "for the batch I have, it's 250 you requested, correct?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 200 of the ivory and 250 of the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 50 for incense from me, so 300.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So deduct 575, but you get 200 gold worth of ivory, 250 of incense, and 50 of incense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is not comfortable to the highest degree, but it works."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It has some openings upon the roof, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We sharing one big, open space, like shared bunks in a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find enough to get comfortably asleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb came up here hoping to fuck with Find Familiar, but that's not going to happen up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, it's just you might draw some attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mentioned windows in the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There aren't windows, but parts of the roof, there are slots that are open for airflow, but arranged so that they're covered on top so that rainfall or any other heavy weather effects wouldn't just pour in over the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's enough airflow to keep the interior from stagnating too much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything like a balcony or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pretty simple structure, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only way up into this room is the way we came, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so a hatch with a ladder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should probably treat this as a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to be a cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I spend the next hour with whoever's watching to draw a circle in chalk on the floor and slowly (whooshing) I have my cat back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will pass the time sipping on my flask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go reach for your flask and it's not there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see my flask? It's big and platinum, and it's magical and has booze in it all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the two of them are up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I don't mean to interrupt your ritual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are messing with my flow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But just, have you seen it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. I have to start over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just tell me when the last time you saw it was, because I had it today for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were chugging on it when--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I would know exactly the last place I saw Nott chugging on her flask, because of my damn feat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm asking for Matthew to speak through me, because I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say it probably would have been probably at the base of the tree, yeah, as you guys were about to take off and head north.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you lose your flask often?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think it fell out on the moorbounders when we were racing away?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if? What if in this, our post-military town, we find you some booze?

lines.name: LIAM
