lines.text: Glancing around, all the statues give off a faint magical essence, so immediately the whole room just lights up around you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the armor and weaponry here has been sundered in some way a long time ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it were magical, it wouldn't be sundered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything of value was probably taken or just disappeared.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to go up closer to one of the statues and just get a closer look, because I haven't quite seen anything like that before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you inspect? What do you do with the statues?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: See their wings, and-- I kind of want to touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run your fingers across it and it just thrums and get stronger and lesser in an inconsistent pattern of vibration as you touch it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you feel something funny when you touched the statue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel another statue and you feel what she's feeling, it's like inconsistent. (vibration)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you feel for a second and there is a rhythm to it, like seven or so consistent types of vibration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's going to be 14 statues in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are the statues different at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- celestials, it makes me nervous about his fascination with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does there appear to be a mechanism attached to the door, lifting it up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell-- Make an investigation check as you approach the door and check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the door opening at all, like minimally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out with this investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My god, that was almost a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought the door was raised.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's raised about a foot and a half.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to know if it's coming up at all, like millimeters, if it's still raising. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking up at the door, you don't see any mechanism for it, but you do see there's a tiny, yellow gem that is affixed to the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The actual door, not above it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the door, and you can see a loose chain that dangles from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, could you tell if there's any footprints in front of that little tiny door just in case that fucker's invisible and in here with us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have the Detect Magic--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk up to the door as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a magical essence coming from that as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From the chain and the gem, or just the gem?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll inspect to see if there's any footprints or crawl marks that go into the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see signs of limbs dragging through and underneath, pushing the dust aside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I stare down underneath the door, see if I can get anything with the Detect Magic for the next 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just then, (vibrating) still holding your hand to that weird--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's see if it's the same rhythm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you guys hum out what you hear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both look at each other, find a way to find a pattern, and it's identical.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put my ear to one of the statues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it sound sad or does it sound--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone's working very hard to keep something inside this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, it is a metal harp!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They appear to be stone, like a smooth alabaster.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It may be dumb, but I'm going to maybe because of being celestial, I'm going to stand by that door and just look at that thing, and see if maybe it'll be like, "Oh, hey, we'll let you in."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sing out loud the song, that oboe I hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're standing amongst a bunch of angel bones and angel skulls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are going to go in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cleric in the front, Cleric in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, with disadvantage because there is no light in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all that Frumpkin can see from four feet in, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, there is an odd smell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not super strong, but it's just faint and generally relegated around the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could send in the globules to light up the room, or we could go in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How often can you be invisible, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another half hour or so, I assume.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd rather do that than light it up, but that's just me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you can already see in the dark, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we might be walking the key master in to the gatekeeper.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, if that's the case, then--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll protect you at all costs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know that, but if it goes awry and they do end up taking me, you guys know what to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was going to do what he was going to do anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're talking, I place my hand on Caduceus' wrist and spend a minute giving him the Gift of Alacrity as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you look like Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he can sound like her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about you do it, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean for a while, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do it to all of us if we all wanted to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be pretty obvious once the fight starts, but yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, to be fair, he doesn't know my voice, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just lower yours, too, so you sound closer to Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I think we, we have a similar timbre.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, what are we doing? Want me to go in? All right, Fjord, give me the flask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The flask that you stole. My flask! I know you did it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm really just distracted right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all stand behind the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what the fuck you're building, but yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they call you Orphan Maker because you had a ton of groupies, and you just made a ton of offspring everywhere you went.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Had a bunch of kids I didn't know about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) The Orphan Maker! The sun come out yet? Ha ha ha ha!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you killed a lot of kids' parents.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or you fucked a lot of people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you very strongly convince them each time that you were killed, and they assume they're an orphan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You convince the other party to leave that child as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet?
